Paul Thomas Hanlon (born 20 January 1990) is a Scottish professional footballer who plays as a defender for Scottish Premiership club Hibernian, where he is the current club captain, and the Scotland national team. He began his senior career with Hibernian, making his debut in 2008, and has gone to make over 420 appearances for the club. He also briefly played for St Johnstone on loan during the 2008–09 season.
Hanlon represented Scotland at the under-19 and under-21 levels, and made his full international debut in October 2020.
